title: 3D HD model atmosphere
author: Cis Lagae
description: An animation showing the temporal evolution of the Solar surface temperature as simulated by the STAGGER code. The simulation is of box-in-a-star type, contains no magnetic fields an encompasses roughly 0.004% of the Solar surface. Longer (or other customised) versions of this movie are available on request to cis.lagae@warwick.ac.uk.
